pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This time-lapse video captures a massive dust storm, known as a haboob, rolling across a desert landscape. The scene features saguaro cacti and desert shrubs in the foreground with a mountain range in the background. The immense wall of orange-brown dust advances from left to right, engulfing the mountains and sky.
